sentences.sContent: He has a good command of English, German, French, Russian, Arabic and even Esperanto.
sentences.sContent_eng: He has a good command of English, German, French, Russian, Arabic and even Esperanto.
sentences.sCn: 他精通英语、德语、法语、俄语、阿拉伯语乃至世界语。

sentences.sContent: In short, for each Arabic numeral, there is one, and only one, Roman numeral which maps to it.
sentences.sContent_eng: In short, for each Arabic numeral, there is one, and only one, Roman numeral which maps to it.
sentences.sCn: 简而言之，对于每个阿拉伯数字，都有一个且只有一个罗马数字会映射到它。

sentences.sContent: He helped me with my Iraqi Arabic, and we talked about everything from the regime to soccer to life in the United States.
sentences.sContent_eng: He helped me with my Iraqi Arabic, and we talked about everything from the regime to soccer to life in the United States.
sentences.sCn: 他教了我一些伊拉克阿拉伯语，还和我一起谈天说地——从政权体系到足球，到美国的生活状况。

phrases.pCn: 阿拉伯树胶；水溶性阿拉伯胶

trans.tranOther: the language or writing of the Arabs, which is the main language of North Africa and the Middle East
